description: Detects remote service activity via remote access to the svcctl named pipe Author: Samir Bousseaden. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Remote Service Activity via SVCCTL Named Pipe
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"5145" AND winlog.event_data.ShareName:\\\*\\IPC$ AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:"svcctl" AND Accesses:*WriteData*)
